original_title: Jag är nyfiken - en film i blått
overview: The same movie with the same characters, cast and crew as I am Curious (Yellow), but with some different scenes and a different political slant. The political focus in Blue is personal relationships, religion, prisons and sex. Blue omits much of the class consciousness and non-violence interviews of the first version. Yellow and Blue are the colors of the Swedish flag.
tagline: Look who's flying into the blue!
title: I Am Curious (Blue)
